quests.name: The First Step
quests.description: Get out of your home and start your adventure

stages.objective: Pick up your backpack, you might need it later
It seems that your backback is torn, so you need to fix it before you can use it. Find an anvil to fix it
You fixed your backpack, now you can use it. Now go out and explore the world

quests.name: The Elmchanted forest
quests.description: Two guards are blocking the way out of the Elmchanted forest. You need to find a way to get past them

stages.objective: Talk to the guards and find out what they want
The guards told you that they want you to get them their pet hedgehog back, go through the forest and find it
You found the hedgehog, but it seems to be scared and is hiding in a bush. Perhaps an apple might help it come out
You gave the hedgehog an apple and it came out of the bush. Now you can take it back to the guards
You took the hedgehog back to the guards. They are very happy and let you pass. Now you can continue your adventure
